shp 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Read .dbf files

Source: R/dbf.R
read_dbf.Rd

Read .dbf files

read_dbf(path, col_spec = "")

read_dbf_meta(path)

Arguments

path

A filename of a .dbf file.
col_spec

A character vector of length one with one character for each column. Use "c" to return the character representation.

Value

A data.frame

Examples

dbf <- system.file("shp/mexico/cities.dbf", package = "shp")
read_dbf(dbf)

#>                  NAME CAPITAL            STATE_NAME POPULATION

read_dbf_meta(dbf)
